name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter
steps: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt, black pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Place lemon slices on top of each fillet. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side or until salmon is cooked through.
In a small saucepan, melt butter. Add minced garlic and chopped dill. Cook until fragrant.
Spoon the lemon herb butter over the grilled salmon before serving.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes. Enjoy your Grilled Salmon with Lemon Herb Butter!
